article_title: Comings and Goings: 4th Avenue becoming a little Rodeo Drive
article_text:
Thank you for reading 5 free articles on our site. og.description: Love fashion and wearing the latest styles? Check out the newest fashion stores in Yuma: On Fourth and Heels have opened at 2718 S. 4th Ave. Owners and buyers are Alejandro and Fatima Carlos, who have more than 20 years of business experience, including 13 years in retail fashions.
